mapper.select: select sum(`value`) `value`,sum(txn_fee) txn_fee from t_rt_txn where `from` = '${_parameter}' and `status` = '1'
select sum(`value`) `value` from t_rt_txn where `to` = '${_parameter}' and `status` = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT `from` FROM ((select `from` FROM t_rt_txn WHERE `from` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{symbol}),'%') LIMIT 0,10) UNION (select `to` FROM t_rt_txn WHERE `to` LIKE concat(concat('%',#{symbol}),'%') LIMIT 0,10)) address
